channel.title: Why doesnt my npcdrop.cfg work?
channel.description:
Im using naderpkz V2 and the npc's that were already there, when i downloaded the source, will drop stuff but when i try to add my own npc drops it doesnt work. the compiler never gives me errors but when i go kill the npc it drops nothing.
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 3340 1 6570 1

item.title: Why doesnt my npcdrop.cfg work?
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Because your top thing is wrong.

its:

//--------NPCID---------Item--------Amount----Drop Rate--

So your drop code should be:

npcdrop = 3340 6570 1 100 For a 100% drop of that items.

Read full topic
